TextView.android:text: Anagrams are words formed by re-arranging the letters of other words or phrases. For example TALE can become LATE, OUTSIDE can be turned into TEDIOUS, and NICE LOVE can be re-arranged into VIOLENCE.
'More fortunate' is another way of saying luckier.
'like cur' is an anagram of luckier.

Anagram indicators are commonly words such as 'bizarrely', 'confused', 'different' or 'scrambled' - words which loosely mean unusual or modified. 'Out' and 'about' are sometimes used but this can depend on the crossword setter.
